name: Blade Psyf3r
description:
The year is 2007. Mega-corporations own more than 99.999% of the world’s economy, exchanging advanced technology in weapons and cybernetics for human lives. The leading developer of these cybernetic developments is DynaCorp, a company whose name can be found in every home in Neo-Tokyo.

Enter the super-hacker Psyf3r. After hacking into DynaCorp’s data networks, she was kidnapped and subjected to years of cybernetic experimentation. Now DynaCorp’s experiment is loose, a psychotic human-machine hybrid, bent on vengeance… or death.

Project lead, game design, story, and moral support by the enigmatic Gremlin Grenade.
gremlingrenade@gmail.com
